Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
EPIC

The Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite


This questionnaire is designed to measure Quality of Life issues in patients with Prostate cancer. To help us get the most accurate measurement, it is important that you answer all questions honestly and completely. Remember, as with all medical records, information contained within this survey will remain strictly confidential.
Field.ElementLabel: Today's Date (please enter date when survey completed):
Name (optional):
Date of Birth (optional):

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
URINARY FUNCTION

This section is about your urinary habits. Please consider ONLY THE LAST 4 WEEKS.
Field.ElementLabel: 1. Over the past 4 weeks, how often have you leaked urine? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
6, More than once a day 
 7, About once a day 
 8, More than once a week 
 9, About once a week 
 10, Rarely or never

Field.ElementLabel: 2. Over the past 4 weeks, how often have you urinated blood? ((Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, More than once a day 
 2, About once a day 
 3, More than once a week 
 4, About once a week 
 5, Rarely or never

Field.ElementLabel: 3. Over the past 4 weeks, how often have you had pain or burning with urination? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, More than once a day 
 2, About once a day 
 3, More than once a week 
 4, About once a week 
 5, Rarely or never

Field.ElementLabel: 4. Which of the following best describes your urinary control during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, No urinary control whatsoever 
 2, Frequent dribbling 
 3, Occasional dribbling 
 4, Total control

Field.ElementLabel: 5. How many pads or adult diapers per day did you use to control leakage during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, None 
 1, 1 pad per day 
 2, 2 pads per day 
 3, 3 or more pads per day

Field.ElementLabel: Dripping or leaking urine

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, No Problem 
 1, Very Small Problem

 3, Moderate Problem 
 4, Big Problem

ElementEnum.RawValue:

 4, Big Problem

Field.ElementLabel: Weak urine stream or incomplete emptying

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, No Problem 
 1, Very Small Problem 
 2, Small Problem 
 3, Moderate Problem 
 4, Big Problem

Field.ElementLabel: Waking up to urinate

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, No Problem 
 1, Very Small Problem

Field.ElementLabel: Need to urinate frequently during the day

ElementEnum.RawValue:

Field.ElementLabel: 7. Overall, how big a problem has your urinary function been for you during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, No problem 
 2, Very small problem 
 3, Small problem 
 4, Moderate problem 
 5, Big problem

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
BOWEL HABITS

The next section is about your bowel habits and abdominal pain. Please consider ONLY THE LAST 4 WEEKS.
Field.ElementLabel: 8. How often have you had rectal urgencduring the last 4 weeksy (felt like I had to pass stool, but did not) during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, More than once a day 
 2, About once a day 
 3, More than once a week 
 4, About once a week 
 5, Rarely or never

Field.ElementLabel: 9. How often have you had uncontrolled leakage of stool or feces? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, More than once a day 
 2, About once a day 
 3, More than once a week 
 4, About once a week 
 5, Rarely or never

Field.ElementLabel: 10. How often have you had stools (bowel movements) that were loose or liquid (no form, watery, mushy) during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Rarely 
 3, About half the time 
 4, Usually 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 11. How often have you had bloody stools during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Rarely 
 3, About half the time 
 4, Usually 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 12. How often have your bowel movements been painful during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Rarely 
 3, About half the time 
 4, Usually 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 13. How many bowel movements have you had on a typical day during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue: 1, Two or less \n 2, Three to four \n 3, Five or more

Field.ElementLabel: 14. How often have you had crampy pain in your abdomen, pelvis or rectum during the last 4 weeks?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, More than once a day 
 2, About once a day 
 3, More than once a week 
 4, About once a week 
 5, Rarely or never

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, No Problem

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, No Problem

Field.ElementLabel: e. Bloody stools

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, No Problem

 4, Big Problem

Field.ElementLabel: f. Abdominal/Pelvic/Rectal pain

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, No Problem 
 1, Very Small Problem

Field.ElementLabel: 16. Overall, how big a problem have your bowel habits been for you during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, No problem 
 2, Very small problem 
 3, Small problem 
 4, Moderate problem 
 5, Big problem

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
SEXUAL FUNCTION

The next section is about your current sexual function and sexual satisfaction. Many of the questions are very personal, but they will help us understand the important issues that you face every day. Remember, this survey information is completely CONFIDENTIAL. Please answer honestly about THE LAST 4 WEEKS ONLY.
17. How would you rate each of the following during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response on each line)
Field.ElementLabel: a. Your level of sexual desire?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Very poor to none 
 2, Poor 
 3, Fair 
 4, Good 
 5, Very good

Field.ElementLabel: b. Your ability to have an erection?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Very poor to none 
 2, Poor 
 3, Fair 
 4, Good 
 5, Very good

Field.ElementLabel: c. Your ability to reach orgasm (climax)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Very poor to none 
 2, Poor 
 3, Fair 
 4, Good 
 5, Very good

Field.ElementLabel: 18. How would you describe the usual QUALITY of your erections during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None at all 
 2, Not firm enough for any sexual activity 
 3, Firm enough for masturbation and foreplay only 
 4, Firm enough for intercourse

StructuredValue.Value: Not firm enough for any sexual activity
Firm enough for masturbation and foreplay only

Field.ElementLabel: 19. How would you describe the FREQUENCY of your erections during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, I NEVER had an erection when I wanted one 
 2, I had an erection LESS THAN HALF the time I wanted one 
 3, I had an erection ABOUT HALF the time I wanted one 
 4, I had an erection MORE THAN HALF the time I wanted one 
 5, I had an erection WHENEVER I wanted one

StructuredValue.Value: I NEVER had an erection when I wanted one
I had an erection LESS THAN HALF the time I wanted one
I had an erection ABOUT HALF the time I wanted one
I had an erection MORE THAN HALF the time I wanted one
I had an erection WHENEVER I wanted one

Field.ElementLabel: 20. How often have you woken in the morning or night with an erection during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Never 
 2, Less than once a week 
 3, About once a week 
 4, Several times a week 
 5, Daily

Field.ElementLabel: 21. During the last 4 weeks, how often did you have any sexual activity? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Less than once a week 
 3, About once a week 
 4, Several times a week 
 5, Daily

Field.ElementLabel: 22. During the last 4 weeks, how often did you have sexual intercourse? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, Less than once a week 
 3, About once a week 
 4, Several times a week 
 5, Daily

Field.ElementLabel: 23. Overall, how would you rate your ability to function sexually during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Very poor 
 2, Poor 
 3, Fair 
 4, Good 
 5, Very good

Field.ElementLabel: a. Your level of sexual desire

ElementEnum.RawValue:
0, No problem 
 1, Very small problem

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, No problem 
 2, Very small problem

Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
HORMONAL FUNCTION

The next section is about your hormonal function. Please consider ONLY THE LAST 4 WEEKS.
Field.ElementLabel: 26. Over the last 4 weeks, how often have you experienced hot flashes? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, More than once a day 
 2, About once a day 
 3, More than once a week 
 4, About once a week 
 5, Rarely or never

Field.ElementLabel: 27. How often have you had breast tenderness during the last 4 weeks? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, More than once a day 
 2, About once a day 
 3, More than once a week 
 4, About once a week 
 5, Rarely or never

Field.ElementLabel: 28. During the last 4 weeks, how often have you felt depressed? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, More than once a day 
 2, About once a day 
 3, More than once a week 
 4, About once a week 
 5, Rarely or never

Field.ElementLabel: 29. During the last 4 weeks, how often have you felt a lack of energy? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, More than once a day 
 2, About once a day 
 3, More than once a week 
 4, About once a week 
 5, Rarely or never

Field.ElementLabel: 30. How much change in your weight have you experienced during the last 4 weeks, if any? (Choose one response)

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Gained 10 pounds or more (<5kg) 
 2, Gained less than 10 pounds (>5kg) 
 3, No change in weight 
 4, Lost less than 10 pounds (<5kg) 
 5, Lost 10 pounds or more (>5kg)
